name: Sea Hunter LD33
description:
This is my first ever Ludum Dare entry!

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=57154

It's badly broken (well sort of, sometimes it'll work!!)

The idea was that you had to feed the shark as much as possible and then before the time runs out i.e the anchor is raised, you have to try and tear the ship above apart.

And yet, this weekend didn't end great! However there are at least some nice art bits going on, and I've definitely learnt a huggggge amount!!

Leave me some feedback @skardrup on Twitter
